name: Array Filter & Select
description: Filters a list of Data objects based on specified indices and optionally filters columns. (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

data_list.name: data_list
data_list.info: List of Data objects to filter.

code.value:
from typing import List, Any
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.io import DataInput, MessageTextInput, Output
from axiestudio.schema import Data

class FilterDataByIndicesComponent(Component):
    display_name = "Filter Data by Indices"
    description = "Filters a list of Data objects based on specified indices and optionally filters columns."
    icon = "filter"
    name = "FilterDataByIndices"
    inputs = [
        DataInput(
            name="data_list",
            display_name="Data List",
            info="List of Data objects to filter.",
            is_list=True,
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="indices",
            display_name="Indices to Select",
            info="List of indices to select from the data list.",
            is_list=True,
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="columns",
            display_name="Columns to Keep (Optional)",
            info="List of column names to keep in the output. If empty, all columns are kept.",
            is_list=True,
            required=False,
        ),
    ]
    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Filtered Data List", name="filtered_data_list", method="filter_data_list"),
    ]

    def filter_data_list(self) -> List[Data]:
        indices: List[int] = [int(i) for i in self.indices if i.isdigit()]
        columns: List[str] = self.columns if self.columns else []
        data_list: List[Data] = self.data_list if isinstance(self.data_list, list) else []
        filtered_data_list = []
        for index in indices:
            if 0 <= index < len(data_list):
                data_item = data_list[index]
                data = data_item.data if isinstance(data_item, Data) else {}
                
                # Filter columns if specified
                if columns:
                    filtered_data = {key: value for key, value in data.items() if key in columns}
                else:
                    filtered_data = data
                
                filtered_data_list.append(Data(data=filtered_data))
        self.status = filtered_data_list
        return filtered_data_list
code.name: code

columns.name: columns
columns.info: List of column names to keep in the output. If empty, all columns are kept.

indices.name: indices
indices.info: List of indices to select from the data list.

from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.io import DataInput, MessageTextInput, Output
from axiestudio.schema import Data

    display_name = "Filter Data by Indices"
    description = "Filters a list of Data objects based on specified indices and optionally filters columns."

    name = "FilterDataByIndices"
    inputs = [

            name="data_list",
            display_name="Data List",
            info="List of Data objects to filter.",
            is_list=True,
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="indices",
            display_name="Indices to Select",
            info="List of indices to select from the data list.",
            is_list=True,

    def filter_data_list(self) -> List[Data]:

                data = data_item.data if isinstance(data_item, Data) else {}
